ftbquests.chapter.everything_from_nothin: Ex NiL[--无中生有--]
The Important Ones, Anyway[--不管怎样，这是重要的一个--]
Auto-Hammah![--自动哐哐哐!--]
Automaing ALL the things![--自动化所有的东西!--]
With a renewable source of Cobble, it's time to start thinking about &6automating and scaling&r.[--有了无限的圆石，是时候考虑&6自动化和升级&r了.--]

&bAuto-hammers&r will automatically hammer the item inside. It will &6pull items from an inventory on the blue side&r, and push the output into an inventory on the red side.[--&b自动锤&r将自动打碎里面的物品。它将&6从蓝色侧的容器中输入物品&r,并将输出物品到红色侧的容器中.--]
By distributing your Cobble to multiple &6lines of Auto-hammers&r, you can completely automate each of the siftable blocks![--将圆石分配到多个&6自动锤产线&r,你可以完全自动化筛子需要的每个方块!--]
Auto-hammers[--自动锤--]
&6Manasteel Mesh&r upgrades into an &bSpringaline Infused Desh Mesh&b using Springaline Desh Alloy.[--使用春涌戴斯合金将&6魔力钢筛网&r升级为&b春涌戴斯筛网&b.--]
Infused Mesh[--灌注筛网--]
The &bManasteel Mesh&r has the ability to extract &6even rarer materials&r that the Andesite Mesh cannot.[--&b魔力钢筛网&r有能力筛出鞍山合金筛网不能获得的&6更珍贵的材料&r--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"Click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4FA6ADCA7857A92F\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Botania chapter\"]}},\" to see the Botania quest chapter for help in making Mana Steel.\"][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"Click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4FA6ADCA7857A92F\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Botania chapter\"]}},\" 查看植物魔法章节以获得魔力钢的制作方法.\"]--]

Obtained by crushing &bEndstone&r. There are several ways to get &bEndstone&r. You can &6summon a possessed Endermite&r with &6Occultism&r and then convert that to &bendstone&r brick for a &6material generator&r. Alternatively, once you have &6Budding Amethyst&r, one will occasionally spawn from the Amethyst. You could also &6build a portal to the End&r or &6fly to the Sky's End in a rocket&r. [--粉碎&b末地石&r获得。有几种方法可以获取&b末地石&r.你可以&6用&6神秘学&r召唤被附身的末影螨&r然后做出&b末地石&r砖块,用于&6材料生成器&r.或者,&6紫水晶发芽&r时,偶尔会从紫水晶中生成一个.你还可以&6建造一个末地传送门&r或者&6乘坐火箭飞到天空末端&r.--]
You can get &bNetherrack&r using &ePedestal&r's Material Generator on Nether Bricks.[--你可以在下界砖上使用&e基座&r的材料生成器来获得&b下界岩&r.--]
You get &oNether Bricks&r by throwing Bricks into the Spiritfire.[--将砖块扔进灵魂火中可以得到&o下界砖块&r.--]
Crushed Netherrack → Andesite Mesh[--粉碎下界岩 → 安山合金筛网--]
Using an &6Andesite Mesh&r to sift &6Crushed Netherrack&r has a chance of dropping &bthese materials&r.[--用&6安山合金筛网&r筛&6粉碎下界岩&r有几率掉落&b这些材料&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山合金等级材料--]
Crushed End Stone → Manasteel Mesh[--粉碎末地石 → 魔力钢筛网--]
&6Crushed End Stone&r passed through a &6Manasteel Mesh&r can drop &bEnder Pearls&r.[--&6粉碎末地石&r用&6魔力钢筛网&r筛可以掉落&b末影珍珠&r.--]
Crushed End Stone → Amethyst Mesh[--粉碎末地石 → 紫水晶筛网--]
Using an &6Amethyst Mesh&r will allow &6Crushed End Stone&r to drop &bDimensional Shards&r.[--用&6紫水晶筛网&r筛&6粉碎末地石&r可以掉落&b维度碎片&r.--]
Waterlogged Sand[--浸水沙子--]
Sifters that are &6waterlogged&r sometimes produce alternative resources.[--&6含水筛子&r有时会产出不同的资源.--]
Waterlogged Sand → Manasteel Mesh[--浸水沙子 → 魔力钢筛网--]
Using a &6Manasteel Mesh&r will get everything an Andesite Mesh can.[--安山合金筛网能筛出来的东西&6魔力钢筛网&r都能筛出来.--]
It will also drop &bPrismarine Shards and Crystals&r.[--&b海晶碎片和海晶沙砾&r也是能筛出来的.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山合金级别材料--]
Manasteel level materials[--魔力钢级别材料--]
Waterlogged Sand → Andesite Mesh[--浸水沙子 → 安山合金筛网--]
Using an &6Andesite Mesh&r to sift &6waterlogged Sand&r has a chance of dropping &bthese materials&r.[--使用&6安山合金筛网&r筛&6浸水沙子&r有几率掉落&b这些材料&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山合金级别材料--]
Crushed Netherrack → Amethyst Mesh[--粉碎下界岩 → 紫水晶筛网--]
Using an &6Amethyst Mesh&r will allow &6Crushed Netherrack&r to drop &bNetherite Scrap&r.[--用&6紫水晶筛网&r筛&6粉碎下界岩&r可以掉落&b下界合金碎片&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山合金级别材料--]
Manasteel level materials[--魔力钢级别材料--]
Waterlogged Sand → Amethyst Mesh[--浸水沙子 → 紫水晶筛网--]
&6Waterlogged Sand&r does &cnot have any additional drops&r when using an Amethyst Mesh.[--用紫水晶筛网筛&6浸水沙子&r时&c没有额外的掉落物&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山合金级别材料--]
Manasteel level materials[--魔力钢级别材料--]
Soul Sand → Andesite Mesh[--灵魂沙 → 安山合金筛网--]
Using an &6Andesite Mesh&r to sift &6Soul Sand&r has a chance of dropping &bthese materials&r.[--使用&6安山合金筛网&r筛&6灵魂沙&r有几率掉落&b这些材料&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山合金级别材料--]
Soul Sand → Manasteel Mesh[--灵魂沙 → 魔力钢筛网--]
&6Soulsand&r does &cnot have any additional drops&r when using a Manasteel Mesh.[--使用魔力钢筛网筛&6灵魂沙&r时&c没有额外的掉落物&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山合金级别材料--]
Soul Sand → Amethyst Mesh[--灵魂沙 → 紫水晶筛网--]
Using an &6Amethyst Mesh&r will allow &6Soulsand&r to drop &bGhast Tears&r.[--用&6紫晶筛网&r筛&6灵魂沙&r可以掉落&b恶魂之泪&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山合金级别材料--]
